Text: Thanks a lot SOBB3029 for sharing the Amazing Race !!!

Thanks for uploading the series, SOBB. I'm a fan of the American version of The Amazing Race and found your torrents by accident, and am glad I did. I enjoyed this series more than any of the American versions.
I too loved the first episode of this race and am now downloading all 12...I will seed I promise.
Ours starts tonight,,,well I am in Canada and have never missed the American series. I too came across this and Top Chef while looking for other things.
I just finished the series...it was one of the best I have ever seen for this show. Real people with normal lives. Thank you for sharing this with me.
